MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Summary of Episode 2. Alexandra ended up being found safe in the desert. She regrets what she did and promises to help out in the mission--

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Noooo! I don't wanna! I don't wanna leave a train with air conditioning like this! I hate the desert, it's so damn hot. Just makes me sweat and get all dirty, the absolute worst!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Come on, can we call it quits? Does this mission even matter? The world will stay peaceful as long as have A/C, right? What's fun about having to go out into a crummy, hot desert? I just don't get it!
Alexandra.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What? You got a problem? I don't wanna do your stinky mission. You all can figure it out on your own, huh? Doesn't matter to me at all, I hate the desert!

Hmph. I had hoped to ask your opinion since I don't know much about the desert. Where would be the best place to leave behind a child throwing a tantrum? Ideally somewhere she doesn't die right away. Maybe a place where she can writhe in agony and suffer for a long time...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What the hell are you even saying!? You sure have shown your true colors now, you beast! You sadistic asshole! You're gonna leave an innocent young lady like me in the desert? Do you really want me to suffer like that?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
You're the fucking worst! And a liar on top of that! 
Didn't you promise me you were done with unreasonable requests, sir!?
And didn't you promise that you'd carry out your mission?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: W-well, yeah I did! I changed my mind. The train is so nice and cool. It's like heaven in here it's so comfortable!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I don't want to spend another second in that desert. Don't you know that I'm swallowed up by that burning sand when I sandswim? Do you want me to get smothered then, huh? You brute!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Come on sir, can we stop this already? Let's just chunk this one in the trash? We can cool off together in the train?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: And I'm gonna make that juice for you too. Let's skip the boring stuff, drink something yummy and just take a load off? We can just tell the people at the top of the SSS that we tried our best but couldn't in the end…?"

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: H-huh? Conductor, what're you doing? Why're putting all that on.. Hahah, did you get a little chilly from the A/C?♪
…I'm going outside.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wha- Why? But that's stupid? You'll die, it's a fiery hell out there? Oh, I get it! You're gonna grab onto me and chuck me outside, huh? You're getting ready to leave me!
I'm carrying out the mission. If you don't want to, you can just wait here. I really did promise you-- I won't force you to do anything.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Huhh? But why? You can't handle the desert, you'll die for sure. You know that, right? The desert is just about the worst place for people to be! I know that better than anyone!

We had plenty of people miss sleep in preparation for this mission. 
Not to mention if we succeed, the world will become just a little safer.

That's why as much as I don't want to and how much it'll suck, and that I might die… But those aren't good enough reasons to abandon this mission. So many people have put hopes and dreams on the line for the SSS to succeed.

I can't be selfish and abandon my mission. 
I will see this through even if it means my death.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wow, you're so dedicated… Stupid and old-fashioned. Hot-blooded old man, a dumbass soldier.
I only will deny being called an old man.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
You're an old man from my perspective. 
Ugh, fine alright! I'm coming too!

You sure? 
No need to force yourself, Alexandra?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I'm going! You know jackshit about the desert. 
So stubborn trying to go out on your own, you dumbass! Just shut your mouth!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Can't believe this, just this time okay? Only because you're being an idiot and I can't just let you go out on your own! I'm real nice, you better thank me later!

Yeah yeah. 
Thank you, Alexandra. I'm happy you felt compelled to join me.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Far from compelled! 
I have no choice! You can bet that I'm not going into this in a good mood!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Let's go! I wanna get this done and over with! 
Something in the air is telling me a sandstorm is coming too-- Sir, take hold of my hand!

Why? 
You're sure a spoiled brat sometimes, Alexandra.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: N-n-no, not like that! Don't get it twisted! I need to lead or you won't make it! Every second you walk in the desert on your own puts you closer and closer to danger. I'm telling you I'll keep you safe and lead you around the desert, so act a little more grateful!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Alexandra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Time to go, Conductor! 
Ugh damn it, I said I wasn't going back to work in the desert!

Despite her grumbling, she moved through the desert expertly at top speed. 
She was doing her job spectacularly.
She did her job so well that she was given only desert missions.
